generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian walkways are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and poles, which are features of sidewalks.
- building: Multiple commercial buildings with storefronts and windows line both sides of the street, fitting the definition of buildings.
- vegetation: Several trees are visible along the street, providing greenery and shade, which are types of vegetation.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Two individuals are seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, including a red car and a black car.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are mounted on poles at the intersection, visible in the image.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs, including a "20" speed limit sign and a parking sign, are visible on poles along the street.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible near the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
